price: Akatazaye kheri, arukaye mipaka, mwenye kutia shaka,
footnotes: Na akapita mipaka kuzuia kheri, mwenye kudhulumu akaipindukia Haki, mwenye kumtilia shaka Mwenyezi Mungu Mtukufu na aliyo yateremsha.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
